data.message: Fix governance action_id consistency and domain mapping: Two fixes implemented: (1) duro_can_execute now returns canonical action_id field matching what gate tools expect, (2) classify_action_domain strips duro_ prefix for consistent domain mapping. Both repos committed and pushed. Requires Claude Code restart to take effect.
data.task: Fix governance action_id consistency and domain mapping
data.outcome: Two fixes implemented: (1) duro_can_execute now returns canonical action_id field matching what gate tools expect, (2) classify_action_domain strips duro_ prefix for consistent domain mapping. Both repos committed and pushed. Requires Claude Code restart to take effect.
